title: Projected increase of the national defense budget in Canada fiscal years 2018 to 2027
yAxis: Annual funding increase in million Canadian dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Annual funding increase in million Canadian dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 10.
In general Annual funding increase in million Canadian dollars has rose over the Year.
Annual funding increase in million Canadian dollars is slightly increasing from 2017-2018 to 2021-2022, and lastly roughly constant from 2021-2022 to 2026-2027.
Maximum Annual funding increase in million Canadian dollars, about 2300.0 was reported at Year 2026-2027
Minimum Annual funding increase in million Canadian dollars about 184.0 was reached at Year 2017-2018
